venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Time changed Wednesday to avoid conflict with Tech Tuesday.

Boston New Tech Meetup #9, Wednesday Sept 21st. Doors open at 6:30 at NERD in the Thomas Paul room, presentations start at 7:30. 6 Presenters each giving 5 minutes of demo followed by 5 minutes of questions. See what's new and cool in the local startup scene!

An assortment of chips and cookies will be provided, thanks to sponsors Open Hosting, Inc.! Free beverages will also be provided, coutesy of the Microsoft NERD Center.

You can park in most MIT lots for free after 5 pm on weekdays. Info here.

Here's the lineup:

  1. Brian Lukoff / Learning Catalytics / @LCatalytics
  2. Tom Morris / Google Refine / @tfmorris
  3. Paul Carnes / Anonymous Revolution
  4. Greg Raiz / AppBlade / @appblade
  5. Dave Fogel / TipTheWeb / @tiptheweb
  6. Matt Thazhmon / Power Inbox / @powerinbox

Please use the hashtag #bnt9 to promote and discuss this event on twitter.

Use PLUG to Connect with Relevant People and Expand Your Network Use Plug to discover and network with people of interest before, during and after the event!  Plug matches you with people you should meet and gives you easy ways to find & connect with relevant people, get event info, follow the event conversation and share event happenings on twitter, facebook and LinkedIn.  Visit http://GetPlug.com to sign up and download Plug mobile apps.  See the Plug User Guide for details on getting started and using each feature:http://bit.ly/PlugHelp 

Help spread the word about these great products by sharing these tweetable posts on social media:

#BNT9 @LCatalytics is the complete solution for managing an interactive classroom! http://learningcatalytics.com #Education

#BNT9 Google Refine from @TFMorris is a power tool for data cleaning & transformation! http://code.google.com/p/google-refine/ #grefine

#BNT9 @PowerInbox brings Apps to your emails, making them more useful! Intro video: http://vimeo.com/powerinbox/intro

#BNT9 @AppBlade creates tools that turn mobile developers into heros,helps companies & enterprises develop,test & deploy outstanding apps!

#BNT9 Support Your Favorite Stuff Online / Publishers Get Tipped Where You Publish w/ #Non-Profit @TipTheWeb http://tiptheweb.org!

#BNT9 The "Anonymous Revolution" is coming to your city soon! http://anonymousrevolution.com
item.name: Boston New Tech Meetup Sept 2011 #bnt9
